title: My First Dynamic Article
excerpt: This is a sample article to demonstrate the dynamic loading and rendering of content using Markdown and JavaScript.
author: Sandarva

title: What we get from reading a book?
excerpt: To this point, I've read more than 30 books. At first i had that habit of highlighting sentences which I can later come and view, but I slowly learned that won't be much useful.
author: Sandarva

title: Life of an idea
excerpt: I've heard a lot of times, an idea should not deserve a life, it should earn it. It's been months, and almost the only job as a founder for me till now has been talking with users and improving the product.
author: Sandarva

title: By endurance we conquer
excerpt: So today I watched this The endurance documentary, which is about the Ernest Shackleton's Antartic expedition. I've been wanting to read that book since more than 1 year, but it's not available here in Nepal.
author: Sandarva
